statements: UPDATE learning_paths SET interests = '{"math": "high", "science": "medium"}', student_id = 123 WHERE path_id = 1;
UPDATE learning_paths SET preferences = '{"reading": "high", "writing": "medium"}', learning_style = 'visual' WHERE student_id = 456;
UPDATE learning_paths SET interests = '{"coding": "advanced", "data science": "intermediate"}', learning_style = 'visual' WHERE student_id = 123 AND path_id = 1;

UPDATE learning_paths SET preferences = '{"coding": "beginner", "data science": "advanced"}', interests = '{"coding": "intermediate", "data science": "advanced"}' WHERE path_id = 2 AND student_id = 456;
UPDATE students SET name = 'John Doe', email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE courses SET category = 'Mathematics', course_description = 'Introduction to Algebra' WHERE course_id = 101;
UPDATE students SET email='john.doe@example.com', name='John Doe' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE courses SET category='Engineering', course_description='Introduction to Engineering course for beginners' WHERE course_id=10;
UPDATE students SET learning_style = 'Visual' WHERE student_id = 1;
UPDATE courses SET description = 'Learn about advanced topics' WHERE course_id = 3;
UPDATE students SET email='updated_email@example.com', learning_style='Visual' WHERE student_id=1;
UPDATE courses SET description='Updated course description', title='New Title' WHERE course_id=3;

UPDATE personalized_learning_paths SET preferences = '{"level":"Intermediate", "type":"Visual"}', interests = '{"category":"Technology", "topic":"Programming"}', learning_styles = '{"style":"Auditory", "level":"Advanced"}' WHERE student_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

UPDATE personalized_learning_paths SET interests = '{"category":"Art", "topic":"Painting"}', preferences = '{"level":"Beginner", "type":"Kinesthetic"}', learning_styles = '{"style":"Visual", "level":"Intermediate"}' WHERE student_id = '987e6543-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE personalized_learning_paths SET interests = '{"Computer Science", "Mathematics"}', preferences = '{"Art", "Music"}' WHERE student_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000'
UPDATE personalized_learning_paths SET preferences = '{"Art", "Music"}', interests = '{"Computer Science", "Mathematics"}' WHERE student_id = '98765432-12ab-11ac-1abc-1234567890ef'
UPDATE Students SET age = 25, name = 'John Doe' WHERE student_id = 1;
UPDATE Courses SET duration_hours = 10, instructor = 'Jane Smith' WHERE course_id = 2;
UPDATE Students SET age = 25, learning_style = 'Visual' WHERE student_id = 1;
UPDATE Courses SET duration_hours = 40, description = 'An advanced course on SQL optimization techniques' WHERE course_id = 3;
